faq.subtitle: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faq.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about our products and services

item1.question: How long does it take to complete an order at Aerisartis?
item1.answer: Production time depends on the type of product, design complexity, size, and order quantity. Estimated production time will be transparently informed before the process begins.

item2.question: What are the advantages of Aerisartis copper and brass craft products?
item2.answer: Aerisartis products are handmade with high attention to detail and material quality. Copper and brass are chosen for their strong visual character, good durability, and ability to present elegant and timeless aesthetic value to spaces.

item3.question: How does the ordering process begin?
item3.answer: Orders begin after initial payment as agreed. Order details, specifications, and design references are sent via WhatsApp or Aerisartis official email.

item4.question: Do you accept custom designs and production-ready files?
item4.answer: Yes. Aerisartis accepts both custom designs and production-ready files. Production begins after the design is approved by the customer.

item5.question: Are design revisions allowed?
item5.answer: Revisions before design approval can be discussed. Revisions after design approval and production has started will incur additional costs according to the production stage.

item6.question: How long is the production process?
item6.answer: Production time depends on the complexity level, size, and order quantity. Estimated time will be informed before production begins.

item7.question: How is quality control performed?
item7.answer: Each product is inspected for quality and conformity before shipment. If there are technical issues, customers will be informed in advance.

item8.question: When will the order be shipped?
item8.answer: Shipping is done after full payment and shipping costs are fully received.

item9.question: Do you provide international shipping?
item9.answer: Yes. Aerisartis provides international shipping with export packaging standards. Shipping costs, taxes, import duties, and customs fees are the customer's responsibility, unless otherwise agreed.

item10.question: Are there possible minor differences in handmade products?
item10.answer: Yes. Each handmade product has unique characteristics. Minor differences in color, texture, or details are part of the craft value and are not considered defects.

howToOrder.subtitle: ORDERING PROCEDURE
howToOrder.description: Clear and structured ordering process to ensure the best results according to your wishes

step1.title: Design & Approval
step1.description: Consult your design with us. We arrange the design based on your materials. Production starts after design approval.

step2.title: Order & Payment
step2.description: Payment is made in stages, then send order details, design references, sizes via WhatsApp or official email.

step3.title: Production Process
step3.description: Products are handmade with perfect details. Estimated time is adjusted to order complexity.

step4.title: Quality Control
step4.description: Every product goes through strict quality inspection before delivery. We ensure it matches your order.

step5.title: Final Payment
step5.description: Complete the final payment and shipping costs before the product is sent.

step6.title: Delivery
step6.description: Products are safely packed and shipped to your address or can be picked up directly at the workshop.

howToOrder.policies_description: Please note the following policies for smooth ordering process

policy1.title: Design Revision
policy1.description: Changes after design approval and production has started will incur additional costs according to production stages.

policy2.title: Product Pickup
policy2.description: Direct pickup deadline is maximum 1 month from product completion notification.

policy3.title: Order Cancellation
policy3.description: 100% refund only if we cannot complete production. Customer cancellation will be deducted according to agreement.

policy4.title: Handmade Character
policy4.description: Minor differences in texture, color, or details are part of handmade product uniqueness, not production defects.

important_notes.title: Important Notes
important_notes.note1: Shipping costs are the customer's responsibility, unless there is a written agreement for subsidized or free shipping.
important_notes.note2: Shipping is done after all payment obligations are fulfilled.
important_notes.note3: If there are technical issues in production, customers will be immediately informed by the Aerisartis team.

ready_stock.title: Ready Stock Products
ready_stock.description: Available products (ready stock) will be shipped after we receive full payment.

custom_order.title: Custom Orders
custom_order.description: For custom product orders, customers are required to make a down payment of at least 50% of the total order value.

payment_settlement.title: Payment Settlement
payment_settlement.description: Remaining payment is made after the customer receives the invoice and documentation in the form of photos of completed products ready for shipment.

bulk_discount.title: Bulk Purchase Discount
bulk_discount.description: Special discounts are available for purchases of more than 10 pcs, with adjusted terms and amounts.

minimum_payment.title: No Minimum & Maximum Order
minimum_payment.description: Aerisartis accepts orders from single items to bulk quantities, with no minimum or maximum limits, tailored to your needs.
